name: Acupuncture
description: Acupuncture is a traditional Chinese healing technique that uses thin needles to stimulate energy flow, alleviate pain, and reduce stress.

name: Aromatherapy Massage
description: Aromatherapy massage combines essential oils with massage to promote relaxation, tension reduction, and mood improvement.

name: Deluxe Organic Facial
description: Our Deluxe Organic Facial rejuvenates your skin with premium organic products, leaving it refreshed and revitalized.

name: AstroCrystal Therapy
description: AstroCrystal Therapy combines crystals with astrology to promote balance, healing, and harmony in your life.

name: Hot Stone Massage
description: Hot Stone Massage uses heated stones to melt tension, soothe sore muscles, and induce deep relaxation.

name: Reiki Healing
description: Reiki promotes relaxation and overall well-being by channeling healing energy through gentle touch.

name: Yoga and Meditation Retreat
description: Escape to our Yoga and Meditation Retreat for daily practices, healthy meals, and transformative experiences.

name: Chakra Balancing
description: Chakra Balancing aligns and cleanses your energy centers, promoting vitality and emotional well-being.

name: Thai Yoga Massage
description: Thai Yoga Massage combines stretching, acupressure, and yoga-like movements to improve flexibility and relaxation.

name: Meditation Classes
description: Join our Meditation Classes to experience inner peace and mental clarity through guided meditation techniques.
